update.foreach:
update t_hkp_hos_house
house_code=#{i.houseCode},
house_name=#{i.houseName},
house_type=#{i.houseType},
house_from=#{i.houseFrom},
house_status=#{i.houseStatus},
house_purpose=#{i.housePurpose},
house_style=#{i.houseStyle},
location_code=#{i.locationCode},
emp_code=#{i.empCode},
owner_code=#{i.ownerCode},
has_alone_building=#{i.hasAloneBuilding},
where_building=#{i.whereBuilding},
has_monolayer=#{i.hasMonolayer},
several_layers=#{i.severalLayers},
where_layer=#{i.whereLayer},
has_eia=#{i.hasEia},
has_whole_rental=#{i.hasWholeRental},
hos_describe=#{i.hosDescribe},
has_cut=#{i.hasCut},
has_certificate=#{i.hasCertificate},
has_registry=#{i.hasRegistry},
has_short_lease=#{i.hasShortLease},
has_parking=#{i.hasParking},
has_platform=#{i.hasPlatform},
has_elevator=#{i.hasElevator},
has_install_crane=#{i.hasInstallCrane},
has_bathroom=#{i.hasBathroom},
has_office_area=#{i.hasOfficeArea},
open_flag=#{i.openFlag},
has_discharge_sewage=#{i.hasDischargeSewage},
lease_expiration = #{i.leaseExpiration},
area=#{i.area},
layer_area=#{i.layerArea},
price=#{i.price},
unit=#{i.unit},
layer_height=#{i.layerHeight},
property_fee=#{i.propertyFee},
less_lease=#{i.lessLease},
more_lease=#{i.moreLease},
max_electric=#{i.maxElectric},
enter_time=#{i.enterTime},
fire_level=#{i.fireLevel},
house_structure=#{i.houseStructure},
industry_restriction=#{i.industryRestriction},
for_insdustry=#{i.forInsdustry},
features=#{i.features},
province=#{i.province},
province_name=#{i.provinceName},
city=#{i.city},
city_name=#{i.cityName},
region=#{i.region},
region_name=#{i.regionName},
street=#{i.street},
street_name=#{i.streetName},
community=#{i.community},
community_name=#{i.communityName},
last_followup_time = #{i.lastFollowupTime},
pt_code = #{i.ptCode},
pt_name = #{i.ptName},
divide_type = #{i.divideType},
divide_ratio = #{i.divideRatio},
divide_cash = #{i.divideCash},
remark=#{i.remark},
cpy_code=#{i.cpyCode},
create_time=#{i.createTime},
last_update_time=#{i.lastUpdateTime},
create_code=#{i.createCode},
create_dept_code=#{i.createDeptCode},
last_update_code=#{i.lastUpdateCode},
is_deleted=#{i.isDeleted},
is_hot=#{i.isHot},
decoration_type=#{i.decorationType},
auth_dept_code=#{i.authDeptCode},
auth_image=#{i.authImage},
auth_code=#{i.authCode},
auth_time=#{i.authTime},
has_crane=#{i.hasCrane},
property_company=#{i.propertyCompany},
max_pass_car=#{i.maxPassCar},
elevator_standard=#{i.elevatorStandard},
elevator_number=#{i.elevatorNumber},
min_acreage=#{i.minAcreage},
elevator_door=#{i.elevatorDoor},
share_open_flag=#{i.shareOpenFlag},
coo_open_flag=#{i.cooOpenFlag},
bearing=#{i.bearing},
lease_negotiable=#{i.leaseNegotiable},
of_the_area=#{i.ofTheArea},
commission=#{i.commission},
id = #{i.id}
and house_code = #{i.houseCode}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_hkp_hos_location WHERE ID IN
#{i}
mapper.select: ${value}
${value}
${value}

SELECT e.user_code as emp_code, e.user_name as emp_name, e.user_img as emp_img FROM t_hkp_hos_apply a LEFT JOIN t_hkp_sys_user_user e ON e.user_code = a .emp_code
a.house_code = #{houseCode}

trim.if: AND ( house_name like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or emp_phone like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or province_name like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or city_name like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or region_name like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or street_name like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or community_name like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or for_insdustry like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or l_detail_address like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or owner_phone like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or owner_name like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or emp_name like '%' || #{keyword} ||'%' or house_number = #{keyword} )

AND ( area BETWEEN #{keywordNumber}-100 AND #{keywordNumber}+100
or price BETWEEN #{keywordNumber}-0.5 AND #{keywordNumber}+0.5
or price BETWEEN #{keywordNumber}-2 AND #{keywordNumber}+2
)

if.test: community != null or street != null or region != null or city != null or province != null
cusProvince != null or cusCity != null or cusRegion != null or cusStreet != null or cusCommunity!=null

mapper.select: select count(id) from t_hkp_hos_house

select * from ( select h.*, l.location_alias as l_location_alias, l.location_code as l_location_code, l.province_name as l_province_name, l.city_name as l_city_name, l.region_name as l_region_name, l.street_name as l_street_name, l.community_name as l_community_name, l.detail_address as l_detail_address, l.door_number as l_door_number, l.longitude as l_longitude, l.latitude as l_latitude, l.traffic_facilities as l_traffic_facilities, e.user_name as emp_name, e.user_phone as emp_phone, o.houseowner_phone as owner_phone, o.houseowner_name as owner_name, o.houseowner_type as houseowner_type, o.company_name as company_name, o.houseowner_code as houseowner_code, e.user_img as emp_img from t_hkp_hos_house h LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_location l on l.location_code = h.location_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_sys_user_user e on e.user_code = h.emp_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_houseowner o on o.houseowner_code = h.owner_code ) TP

SELECT h.house_name, h.price, h.unit, h.area, h.max_electric, h.layer_height, h.has_cut, h.has_certificate, h.has_registry, h.has_eia, h.owner_code, h.share_open_flag, h.coo_open_flag, us.user_name as create_name, l.location_code AS l_location_code, l.location_alias AS l_location_alias, l.province_name AS l_province_name, l.city_name AS l_city_name, l.region_name AS l_region_name, l.street_name AS l_street_name, l.community_name AS l_community_name, l.detail_address AS l_detail_address, l.door_number AS l_door_number, l.longitude AS l_longitude, l.latitude AS l_latitude, l.traffic_facilities AS l_traffic_facilities FROM t_hkp_hos_house h LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_location l ON l.location_code = h.location_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_sys_user_user us ON us.user_code = h.create_code WHERE h.house_code = #{houseCode}

SELECT count(1) FROM( SELECT h.*, l.location_alias as l_location_alias, l.province as l_province, l.city as l_city, l.region as l_region, l.street as l_street, l.province_name as l_province_name, l.city_name as l_city_name, l.region_name as l_region_name, l.street_name as l_street_name, l.community_name as l_community_name, l.detail_address as l_detail_address, e.user_name as emp_name, e.user_phone as emp_phone, o.houseowner_phone as owner_phone,
case when hf.house_code is null then false else true end as has_favorite,
o.houseowner_name as owner_name, o.houseowner_type as houseowner_type, o.company_name as company_name FROM t_hkp_hos_house h
INNER join t_hkp_hos_favorite f on f.house_code = h.house_code AND f.emp_code = #{favEmpCode}
INNER join t_hkp_union_cooperate c on c.house_code = h.house_code AND(c.apply_code = #{cooEmpCode} or c.receive_code = #{cooEmpCode})
left join t_hkp_hos_favorite hf on hf.house_code = h.house_code AND hf.emp_code = #{userCode}
LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_location l on l.location_code = h.location_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_sys_user_user e on e.user_code = h.emp_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_houseowner o on o.houseowner_code = h.owner_code ) TP

SELECT COUNT (C .emp_code) FROM t_hkp_crm_customer C
C .emp_code = #{empCode}

SELECT COUNT (h.emp_code) FROM t_hkp_hos_house h
h.emp_code = #{empCode}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_hkp_crm_followup_house WHERE house_code = #{houseCode}

SELECT count(1) FROM t_hkp_union_cooperate
house_code = #{houseCode} and (apply_code = #{empCode} or receive_code = #{empCode}) and coo_status > '2'
mapper.update:
update t_hkp_hos_house
house_status=#{houseStatus},
emp_code=#{empCode},
is_deleted=#{isDeleted},
down_reason = #{downReason},
lease_expiration = #{leaseExpiration},
remark = #{remark},
where house_code = #{houseCode}
mapper.select: SELECT hos.*, l.location_alias AS l_location_alias, l.province AS l_province, l.city AS l_city, l.region AS l_region, l.street AS l_street, l.province_name AS l_province_name, l.city_name AS l_city_name, l.region_name AS l_region_name, l.street_name AS l_street_name, l.community_name AS l_community_name, l.detail_address AS l_detail_address, e.user_name AS emp_name, e.user_phone AS emp_phone, o.houseowner_phone AS owner_phone, o.houseowner_name AS owner_name FROM t_hkp_hos_house hos LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_location l ON l.location_code = hos.location_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_sys_user_user e ON e.user_code = hos.emp_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_houseowner o ON o.houseowner_code = hos.owner_code WHERE EXISTS( SELECT folhos.house_code FROM t_hkp_crm_followup_house folhos WHERE EXISTS( SELECT cusfollowup.followup_code FROM t_hkp_crm_customer cus INNER JOIN t_hkp_crm_customer_followup cusfollowup ON cus.cus_code = cusfollowup.cus_code WHERE cus.cus_code = #{cusCode} AND cusfollowup.followup_type = #{followupType} AND cusfollowup.followup_code = folhos.followup_code ) AND folhos.house_code = hos.house_code )

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT hos.*, l.location_alias AS l_location_alias, l.province AS l_province, l.city AS l_city, l.region AS l_region, l.street AS l_street, l.province_name AS l_province_name, l.city_name AS l_city_name, l.region_name AS l_region_name, l.street_name AS l_street_name, l.community_name AS l_community_name, l.detail_address AS l_detail_address, e.user_name AS emp_name, e.user_phone AS emp_phone, o.houseowner_phone AS owner_phone, o.houseowner_name AS owner_name FROM t_hkp_hos_house hos LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_location l ON l.location_code = hos.location_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_sys_user_user e ON e.user_code = hos.emp_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_houseowner o ON o.houseowner_code = hos.owner_code WHERE EXISTS( SELECT folhos.house_code FROM t_hkp_crm_followup_house folhos WHERE EXISTS( SELECT cusfollowup.followup_code FROM t_hkp_crm_customer cus INNER JOIN t_hkp_crm_customer_followup cusfollowup ON cus.cus_code = cusfollowup.cus_code WHERE cus.cus_code = #{cusCode} AND cusfollowup.followup_type = #{followupType} AND cusfollowup.followup_code = folhos.followup_code ) AND folhos.house_code = hos.house_code ) ) hos

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT hos.house_code AS house_code, emp.user_name AS emp_name, u.user_name AS create_name, u.owner_dept_name AS create_dept_name, CASE updown_log.aft_status WHEN '1' THEN '' WHEN '2' THEN '' ELSE '' END AS updown_type, updown_log.remark AS remark, updown_log.create_time AS create_time, hos.is_deleted as is_deleted FROM t_hkp_hos_updown_log updown_log LEFT JOIN t_hkp_hos_house hos ON updown_log.house_code = hos.house_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_sys_user_user u ON updown_log.create_code = u.user_code LEFT JOIN t_hkp_sys_user_user emp ON hos.emp_code = emp.user_code ) up_down
mapper.insert:
insert into t_hkp_hos_updown_log
house_code,
remark,
create_time,
last_update_time,
create_code,
create_dept_code,
last_update_code,
is_deleted,
user_code,
pre_status,
aft_status,
#{houseCode},
#{remark},
#{createTime},
#{lastUpdateTime},
#{createCode},
#{createDeptCode},
#{lastUpdateCode},
#{isDeleted},
#{userCode},
#{preStatus},
#{aftStatus},
